name: truffle-python-node-project
description: A project configured to run with both Python and Node.js

scripts.postinstall:
echo 'To set up the Python environment, follow these steps:

1. Install virtualenv if you don't have it:
   pip install virtualenv

2. Create a virtual environment:
   virtualenv venv

3. Activate the virtual environment:
   For Windows:
     venv\Scripts\activate
   For macOS/Linux:
     source venv/bin/activate

4. Install Python dependencies:
   pip install -r requirements.txt

5. Run the project:
   python3 app.py or npm run start:node'
